boardgame.name: Midgard
boardgame.description: In this area-control boardgame with a mythic Scandinavian theme, players draft cards to place their viking warriors and leaders in the different realms found in Norse mythology. Beware! Some regions will suffer Ragnarok, sending your pieces to Valhalla._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

We are a licensed Games Workshop retailer and have a large selection of Warhammer merchandise in stock. If there is something you are looking for, please feel free to contact us directly in the store.
